relevant_findings.general: A&Ox3, well-appearing male, not in distress
relevant_findings.HEENT: No scleral icterus, no palpable lymphadenopathy
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes/rhonchi
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Normal rate and rhythm, no murmurs/rubs/gallops
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, non-distended, tenderness to palpation in bilateral lower quadrants and periumbilical area. No rebound tenderness, no guarding, no palpable masses. Positive obturator and Rovsing's sign, negative psoas sign.
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm, well-perfused bilaterally, no cyanosis/clubbing/edema, no ulcerations
relevant_findings.neurological: Moves all limbs spontaneously, no focal deficits
